alert.note: Alert for San Saba (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 08 at 10:14PM CDT until further notice by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN SAN SABA COUNTY... At 1013 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Elm Grove, and moving south around 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Skeeterville around 1110 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Harkeyville, Spring Creek, Us-190 Near The Mcculloch- San Saba County Line, Locker and Hall. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
